actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to direct the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to conduct a scientific study to determine the relationship between amputations and cardiovascular disorders.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to make a detailed study to scientifically determine if there is a causal relationship between the amputation of an extremity and cardiovascular disorders that are subsequently incurred by service-connected amputee veterans. Requires the report together with such recommendations as the Administration deems appropriate to be submitted to the Speaker of the House and the President of the Senate not later than 90 days following the convening of the 95th Congress.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to conduct a scientific study to determine the relationship between amputations and cardiovascular disorders.
